questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical Damage of the Equipment
prepare Incident / Damage and Missing Report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON
check whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.
shift the equipment to another place where the AC Voltage of 230 is provided
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective
replace the power cord with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether the input voltage of 230 AC is available
check whether there is any carbon formation or breakage of input pin connector
clean or replace the input pin connector accordingly
check the continuity of switch and confirm whether the switch is defective
replace the switch with a new one
check whether the transformer input of 230 VAC is available
repair / replace the filter board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video required for replacing the filter board

questions.question: check whether the transformer output is available
replace the transformer with a new one
check whether the input voltage to control board is available.

videos.videoName: Video for checking I/P of control board

questions.question: check the connecting cables from power supply to control board for any loose connections or breakage of cable
, reseat / replace the cables accordingly
, repair / replace the power supply board accordingly and confirm whether the problem still persist.
replace / repair the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the heat is produced from the heater coil when the equipment is ON.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the continuity of coil and confirm whether the coil is defective
replace the coil with a new one
check and confirm whether the some of the buttons / buttons on keypad are not responding.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the continuity of microswitches and confirm whether the switches are defective
replace the switches with the new one
check and confirm whether the display blank / plan after the equipment is ON
open the equipment as shown in the video, repair / replace the display board accordingly
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
